channel.title: ZMI Altar
channel.description: Im curious as to if the ZMI Altar is profitable at level 72 runecrafting. or is it only after you get 75?

item.title: ZMI Altar
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Speaking of which, astrals are rising a lot. Not good for someone like me doing livid farm…

Read full topic

item.title: ZMI Altar
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Don’t forget nature runes are used in other high xp spells that people use to reach 99 such as plank make, superheat item and string jewellery. Also the livid farm activity relies heavily on nature runes and is quite a popular method to reach 99 farming quickly.

Read full topic

item.title: ZMI Altar
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Phaze One:

Runes are about to absolutely sky rocket due to the lack of nature/blood/death bots constantly streaming them in. I’d wait a little while to start ZMI but once you do make sure you have atleast Ardougne cloak 2.

I beg to differ with natures. Sure, you had a ton of bots mining pure essence, and a ton crafting nature runes. But in all honesty, I’d guess most of the alchers using those nature runes were botters too. Natures are going to go up, but probably not as much as many of the combat-based runes.

Read full topic

item.title: ZMI Altar
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Runes are about to absolutely sky rocket due to the lack of nature/blood/death bots constantly streaming them in. I’d wait a little while to start ZMI but once you do make sure you have atleast Ardougne cloak 2.

item.title: ZMI Altar
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

It’s not significantly “profitable” until the 90s. And once you reach double nats, obviously it’s a pitiful amount of profit compared to those.

Edit: I do mean relative. So inb4 anyone says natures aren’t worth much anymore, most runes are going down (which makes ZMI less profitable as well). Then again, both are relative to the price of essence anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: ZMI Altar
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

even then you won’t make much money. Go there for the fast xp, You’ll be profitable later on but not to a high extent.
Also If I called recalled correctly I lost around 30k an hour from 60 to 70 then I broke even for a level or two and then
started making around 40k an hour.

Read full topic
